summary: Frontend Team Lead with 10+ years building web applications for international clients across e-commerce, IoT, and Web3. Currently leading a 7-engineer frontend team working with micro-frontend architecture, Lit web components, and TypeScript. Track record of delivering high-performance applications (improved Lighthouse scores from 30 to 90+), building testing practices from scratch, and mentoring developers across distributed teams in US, EU, and LATAM time zones. Strong expertise in React, Next.js, and TypeScript with growing focus on AI-integrated applications.

experience.title: Frontend Team Lead
experience.description: Managing technical architecture, sprint planning, and performance reviews for frontend team on enterprise consulting project.
achievements: Set up code review standards and defined technical decision-making process for the team
Configured Jest and Playwright testing with CI/CD pipelines in GitLab
Mentoring engineers on TypeScript patterns, web components, and system design

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built user interfaces for decentralized hosting platform. Worked async across US, EU, and LATAM time zones. Company had 95% workforce reduction during restructuring.
achievements: Improved homepage Lighthouse score from 30 to 90+ by optimizing images, converting animations to WebM, adding lazy loading, and splitting bundles per page
Built AI chat interfaces using LangChain and Eliza frameworks; published npm package (@fleek-platform/agents-chatbox-widget) for embeddable chatbots
Developed UI component library and state management with Zustand

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built web applications for carbon certificate cashback platform, both as main product and white-label solution for partners like ADAC (Germany's largest automotive club).
achievements: Built vehicle submission and tracking dashboard with Next.js; achieved Lighthouse 90+ and WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility
Set up testing with Jest and React Testing Library from scratch
Improved Core Web Vitals and implemented SEO best practices

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Delivered enterprise-grade frontend solutions for major international clients including Vodafone Germany, Ibersol Group, and Dreamlines cruise platform.
achievements: Architected WordPress to React migration for Dreamlines cruise platform (product pages, homepage, cart), improving load times by removing Cloudflare Worker middleware
Established testing strategy with Jest, Testing Library, and Cypress improving code reliability across team
Mentored 2-3 junior developers on React patterns and conducted technical interviews for engineering candidates

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to frontend development for Anova's IoT petrochemical monitoring platform and YOOX Net-a-Porter's luxury e-commerce site (The Outnet).
achievements: Implemented micro-frontend modules for Anova's IoT platform and real-time dashboard monitoring petrochemical sensors
Shipped features for The Outnet e-commerce platform integrating CoreMedia CMS
Reduced frontend bundle size for The Outnet content pages (homepage, blog, articles) through strategic code-splitting and lazy loading

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Built POC for Plinth (real estate crowdfunding startup), migrating from Angular 4 to React. Worked on AngularJS to React migration for Statful monitoring platform.
achievements: Successfully migrated applications from Angular/AngularJS to React
Applied testing strategies with Selenium, Cypress, and Jest

experience.title: IT Consultant
experience.description: Built browser-based TV application for Vodafone Portugal, replicating the set-top box experience in the web browser using AngularJS.
achievements: Developed browser-based TV application mirroring set-top box UX for Vodafone Portugal

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Worked on websites, dashboards, and Android applications.
achievements: Developed Android applications alongside web projects

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Internship developing an eCommerce website using WordPress.
achievements: Developed eCommerce website with WordPress and SEO optimization

education.degree: Master's degree, Artificial Intelligence Engineering (Evening program)

education.institution: Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Coimbra

projects.name: Fleek Agents Chatbox Widget
projects.description: Embeddable chat widget for AI-powered chatbots built on the Eliza framework. Published as npm package for customer chatbot deployment.
highlights: Published npm package for embedding AI chatbots
Built for Fleek's AI agents platform

projects.name: Job Sentinel
projects.description: LLM-powered job search automation tool built as a meta-experiment: using AI-assisted development to build an AI-powered application. Features multi-agent LangGraph workflow for job scraping, parsing, and matching.
highlights: Multi-agent LLM workflow with parser, matcher, coordinator, and discovery agents
Clean Architecture with 14.7K LOC across domain, application, and infrastructure layers
Support for 4+ job board platforms (Greenhouse, Lever, Workable, BambooHR)
88+ tests with comprehensive unit and integration coverage

projects.name: Jira Timesheet Report
projects.description: Browser-based time tracking dashboard that integrates with Jira to display, filter, and export team worklogs in a calendar view. Runs entirely in the browser with no backend required.
highlights: Calendar view with monthly worklog visualization and team overview
CSV export for individual or bulk timesheet reports
Offline development mode using MSW for API mocking
Retroactive worklog detection for past-dated entries
